modName: Mage Armor as it should be (last 1hr)
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever rolled a mage and wondered why in the hell are you using plate armor and you are a mage? I know I have. The reason I did is because I got sick of casting mage armor every other fight. Most other RPGs allow mage armors to last about 1hr, the hell was Bethesda thinking?!!! I also nerfed the magic cost to armor to 50 magic points just flat out foolishnessâ€¦



Oakflesh - Novice (Lasts 1hr)
Stoneflesh - Apprentice (Lasts 1hr)
Ironflesh - Adept (Lasts 1hr)
Ebonyflesh - Expert (Lasts 1hr)
Dragonhide - Master (Lasts 2hr)
author: Bob100
